block.name: Compressed File Sink
block.doc:
This compression file sink is designed to take a compressed message from the compress block and write it to the specified file.
NOTE: File Format is chained sequences of blocks in the format: [Header][Compressed Block] where [Header] is uint64_t uncompressed_size; uint64_t compressed_size. Compressed size defines the length of the [Compressed Block]
This block has a symetric counterpart in the CompressedFileSource block to read it back in.
